src.estimation.euclidean module¶

This module provides a euclidean estimator (nn search with euclidean distance).


class src.estimation.euclidean.EuclideanEstimator(words, phoc_level=3, alphabet=[<Alphabet.ASCII_LOWER: 1>, <Alphabet.ASCII_DIGITS: 4>, <Alphabet.ASCII_PUNCTUATION: 3>])[source]¶
